fields.name: Attribute
fields.description: The TrackAttribute to filter the tracks by.

fields.name: Filter
fields.description: The type of AttributeFilter to apply to the TrackAttribute in order to select the tracks.

fields.name: FilterValue
fields.description: The value to filter the tracks by.  Only used when AttributeFilter.ValueEquals is specified for the Filter property. For TrackAttribute.Bitrate, this should be an integer value in bits per second (e.g: '1500000').  The TrackAttribute.Language is not supported for video tracks.
